mineSweeper

Class RandomPointGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • mineSweeper.RandomPointGenerator

  • public class RandomPointGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Tom Leibovich and Roee Shachar This class generates a random point between 0X0 to rowsXcolumns. Initially it receives two integers that determine the bottom and right bounds and an array is initiated with all possible options. In each call one point is removed and the array is shortened by one.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomPointGenerator(int rows, int columns)
      this constructor fills the array with all possible points from 0X0 to rowsXcolumns

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Point getPoint()
      getPoint removes a random element from the array and replaces it with the last one
      void remove(int x, int y, int columns)
      removes a point from the array without returning it.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        removes a point from the array without returning it.
